member.name: MFSensorStreamType
member.summary: Specifies whether a stream associated with an is an input or an output stream.

member.name: MFSensorStreamType.MFSensorStreamType_Unknown
member.summary: The sensor stream type is unknown.

member.name: MFSensorStreamType.MFSensorStreamType_Input
member.summary: The sensor stream is an input stream.

member.name: MFSensorStreamType.MFSensorStreamType_Output
member.summary: The sensor stream is an output stream.
